name: Truck Driver Simulator 3D
description:
Find a job.

Check the docks, gas stations, roadside motels and other places in search of contracts.

Become a mogul!

Build your own transportation empire and monopolize the market of freight traffic in North America.

Remember: The customer is always right!

Improve your reputation by fulfilling the orders on time.

Size matters!

Hold the high-carriage, which are able to carry out only a few dozen heavy trucks. Convoy escorts and expose its collision with the police!

Big car. Big business. If you find interesting the transportation of cargo on a big truck over long distanceshaving, then this game is for you. If you think that this is kinda boring pastime - it is especially for you!

he cargo must be delivered on time! Contract and go on a journey along the roads of 11 US states.

But just to come on a schedule not enough, we must also ahead of the competition, to determine the amount of cargo and post it,

to monitor the fuel level and avoid problems with the police. Delay means money. Oh, and do not forget the most important thing - hold on tight to the steering wheel!

You are driving a big car.
